title: My Family is Obsessed with Me - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manhwa   Adopted Children   Adopted Protagonist   Age Progression   Child Protagonist   Childcare   Doting Older Siblings   Doting Parents   European Ambience   Familial Love   Female Protagonist   Magic   Orphans   Reincarnation   Second Chance
author: Lee Surim   이수림
description:
I was a warrior.

Albeit one who died after being taken advantage of my entire previous life.

I was reborn, so I tried to get revenge, but how could I be so unlucky to get kidnapped and sent to an orphanage?

But–

“Why don’t you come with us?”

I was adopted by a rich family. 

Thus, I decided to leave in three years' time, after causing a moderate amount of trouble.

“Are you going to leave?”

“Huh?”

“Are you really leaving us?”

–My family refused to let me go. 

Why are they so obsessed with me?!>
